attributes.action: TO STOP THE VIRUS WE NEED STRONGER ACTIONS
attributes.additional_details:
People are dying more day by day, instead of reducing It's increasing more and more. This Government should do a TOTAL LOCKDOWN. The Lockdown we are currently in is not nothing like March 2020. There are too many people out there, alot pf people don't even wear masks, keep their distance. JUST DO IT, KEEP PEOPLE SAFE, SAVE LIVES OF PEOPLE, TAKE ACTION NOW BEFORE IT'S TOO TOO LATE.
THANK YOU
attributes.background: The Government should implant strict rules for this Lockdown, this deadly Virus has killed many, many people. Wednesday 6th Jan 2021, new cases 62,322, death 1,041, highest since April 2020. WE NEED A PROPER LOCKDOWN like the way we had in 2020. TAKE ACTION BEFORE IT'S TOO TOO LATE
